pages.text: 當然，在生活中，任何人處理樹木時都會面臨著這著名的問題: 一顆$(item)橡木樹苗$()長成了一株看不到頭的$(thing)參天大樹$()，而你要去砍伐它。$(br)$(item)樹冠減光器$()是一個有著雙重用途的方塊：$(br)將它放置在樹苗附近大約10方塊遠，

normal-sized oaks to grow.$(br)In the process, the additional natural energy of any saplings that were growing into big trees gets turned into a quite substantial amount of $(aura) that will be fed into the environment.$(br)It should be noted that, as the $(thing)overworld$() realm is the only area where the trees in question naturally grow, it is also the only area where this device has an effect.$(br)Quite obviously, a great way to make use of this is for an automatic $(thing)tree farm$().
